xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_confirm_tit: Are you sure you want to exchange this modem?
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_confirm_sub: The modem will be sent automatically to the address of the contact selected.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_success_mes: You will receive an email detailing the steps you will need to take to send us your old modem.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_error_ERR01: An error has occurred attempting to retrieve information on internet access.
An error has occurred attempting to retrieve information linked to the internet contract.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_error_ERR05: An error has occurred determining the latest modem model.
An error occurred while retrieving information on the delivery address.
An error occurred while retrieving information on the delivery address.
An error has occurred requesting a comfort exchange.
An error occurred while retrieving the purchase order.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_error_ERR00: You already have the latest modem model.
A return or exchange refund is already being processed for this modem.
The NIC handle entered for delivery seems not to exist, or is not associated with the customer account.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_error_conta: The delivery contact selected is not valid.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_already_ope: There is already a hardware exchange request in progress.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_link_in_new: Opens the link to the purchase order in a new tab
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_error_ERR00: Modem replacement is not authorised for SDSL access.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_warning_par: We are getting in touch to offer you a more recent modem, if the features of your current modem are no longer suited to your needs.
If any issues occur on your current modem, please do not initiate an exchange via this tool. Please contact the support team.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_shipping_ad: Oops! An error occurred while loading your delivery addresses.
xdsl_access_comfort_exchange_shipping_co: Delivery address for the new modem
